overview: Join our heroes as they help Mrs. Portillo prepare for Cinco de Mayo. Share the excitement when Mr. Lopart gets a wonderful surprise. And watch as Squeeze and Rusty learn a valuable lesson about takign turns when each wants to be the first to swing at a party pinata. You're invited to have a fantastic time as you wish Manny and his friends Feliz Cumpleanos - Happy Birthday!
title: Handy Manny: Happy Birthday
